The original photograph was taken by Ast: 2. The image of Leonard Nimoy was taken from a separate photograph showing the Spock actor leaning against his 1964 Buick Riviera.
The composite image that circulated on s: featuring Lennon and Nimoy together, was digitally altered and therefore not authentic.
Another fake version of the image replac: which was created by flipping and superimposing a photograph of Presley onto the original Lennon image.
